reviews.review: Dá medo no começo mas depois é bem legal. Muito melhor do que sexta feira 13 kkk

ever since the latest update my game constantly froze , before the update it was fine . it won't hang or froze every since the update the whole game keep froze n stop but the sound u hear are still fine . n the specs requirement for my pc is fine . its froze right when i start the game n when i get hook on the second stage where u need to struggle . Moreover even the game froze i can still go out of the game n watch youtube with just fine . after the match when i press enter it freaking made my game not full screen anymore wth

Killer is op in solos, underpowered in SFW. Hitboxes are absolutely garbage. Perks dont activate sometimes. Your teamates can abandon you for no reason, or team with killer and betray you to farm.

really good game, very enjoyable with friends. my only complaint are the amount of bugs and crashes with this game.
I have fun, that's all that matters.

good game. Killer is fun. Unless you're a huntress main. Then you are a horrible person

incrivel amar um jogo cheio de bugs kkkk

Buen juego, mucha variedad y dinamismo en las partidas. Partidas cortas y sencillas, facil de comprender y rápido. El juego por más que no logres escapar o pierdas la partida aún así recompensa con muchos puntos de sangre por lo que es raro que no valga la pena el haber jugado una partida, el altruismo y el compañerismo siempre están presentes y rara vez la comunidad suele ser tóxica.
hoş ve bol bol eğleneceğin biraz zor bir oyun
Oyun genel olarak güzel ama bu oyunun siktiğiminin yapımcıları yenilik getirdimi bi taraftanda oyunu sikiyolar ama sonra düzenliyor dediğim gibi iyi oyun surv ağa kati mahçup maraba.
The game is very fun and you can get alot of fun out of it

game is so scary, the killers stand menacingly in front of you once hooked and follow you relentlessly after being saved. And when they nod their head? Don't get me started... it's so scary, the inner machinations of their mind are like an enigma. Send shivers down my back...
Definitely give this game a try. FOR REAL,,,,
Wenn du richtig bock hast einen Herzinfarkt zu bekommen und mental abgehärtet zu werden, auf jeden Fall!
There is a lot of complexity to this seemingly simple game. Each trial is a new experience of chase or be chased.
